title: "Machine learning helps GM pick the best places to put new EV fast chargers"
excerpt: "GM's transformation into an EV-heavy company has not gone entirely smoothly thus far, but in 2022, it revealed that, together with the Pilot company, it was planning on deploying a network of 2,000 DC fast chargers at Flying J and Pilot travel centers around the US. But how to decide which locations?"
